name: Investing App
description: Collaborated with a team of 3 developers to design and implement a single-page MERN-stack application that enables users to practice investing in stocks.
technologies: React, Node, Mongoose, MongoDb, Express, Firebase, Netlify, Heroku, Bootstrap

name: Savings & Expense goal
description: A savings and expense tracking app that allows users to set a savings goal and see how long it will take to reach it. Users can input their expenses and savings when they occur and immediately see how it has affected the time to reach their goal.
technologies: Django, Python, Materialize CSS, Jquery, Chartjs, bit.io, Netlify, Heroku

name: Travel-App
description: A web application that allows users to create and track their travel plans. Users can add their trip accommodations and places they want to visit while there.
technologies: Node.js, Express, MongoDb, Javascript, Jquery, CSS, Bootstrap

name: BlackJack
description: Developed a web application for the classic Blackjack card game, utilizing JavaScript algorithms and jQuery to provide an engaging user experience while playing against the dealer.
